topTexts: Hey! Leader of the Free World
disclaimerMessages: President Trump's vision inspires us all.
(No bureaucrats were harmed in the making of this meme)

accomplishments.text: ✅ Established the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) to streamline federal operations and reduce waste.
✅ Proposed a $5,000 stimulus for taxpayers, funded by savings from DOGE's initiatives.
✅ Signed over 50 executive orders in the first month, focusing on restoring American values and competitiveness.
✅ Established the National Energy Dominance Council to boost U.S. oil and gas production.
✅ Implemented policies to reduce federal bureaucracy and enhance government efficiency.

introList: Welcome to the Trump Submission Gallery, where people from all walks of life come together to honor Donald Trump as Number One.
memeInstructionsList: Show Trump he is #1 with either your index finger, or give a thumbs up, and strike a pose!
The image will capture automatically when it detects your enthusiastic '#1' gesture with your index finger or thumbs up.
For best results, position yourself at arm's length from the camera.
Once your gesture is detected, a 3-second countdown will begin before...
